title: Your Husband is Cheating on Us
overview: Your Husband is Cheating on Us shines a light on this powerful world revealing the show behind the show. Over the course of the series, producer and director JD Lawrence mounts his new production of the stage play Your Husband Is Cheating On Us, implementing unorthodox creative methods with his cast. His strategies include moving everyone into a house together and injecting real-life experiences from their lives into the script. Additionally, the behind-the-scenes drama between the cast members takes matters to another level that will either make or break the show.
